Reference

All functions

CTPL()

Search Families Based on Scientific or Chinese Names of Plants

TPL()

Looking up Family, Family Number and Order in Modern Classification Systems.

acc_dat

The accepted plant names from the Plant List

cnplants_dat

The Chinese Plants Database

count_taxa()

Get the number of taxa under each taxonomic level for a dataframe generated by the function CTPL

genera_dat

The genera-family database for vascular plants

make_checklist()

Generate a Markdown Checklist of Species based on the output of CTPL

orders_dat

Order-Family Database for Angiosperms

parse_taxa()

Parsing scientific names

plantlist-package

Looking Up the Status of Plant Scientific Names based on The Plant List Database

status()

Looking for the taxonomic status of species

syn_dat

Synonyms database from The Plant List

taxa.table()

Making a Taxa Table based on the result of function TPL for Phylomatic
